failure.description: We couldn't process your payment. Don't worry, you haven't been charged.
failure.paymentFailedDescription: Your payment could not be processed. This usually happens due to insufficient funds, card decline, or incorrect payment details.
failure.syncFailedDescription: Your payment was successful, but we encountered an issue activating your subscription. Our team has been notified and will resolve this shortly.
failure.authFailedDescription: Your session expired during payment processing. Please sign in and try again.
failure.unknownErrorDescription: An unexpected error occurred while processing your payment. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
failure.noPurchaseFoundDescription: We couldn't find a recent credit purchase for your account. If you believe this is an error, please contact support.

commonReasons.title: Common Reasons for Payment Failure:

commonReasons.bankRejection: Transaction rejected by your bank for security reasons

support.title: Need Help?
support.description: If you believe this is an error or if you were charged but still see this message, please contact our support team immediately. We're here to help resolve any billing issues.
support.includeInfo: Please include any error codes shown above when contacting support.

subscriptionChanged.noSubscriptionFoundDescription: We couldn't find an active subscription. Please try subscribing to a plan.

errors.retryHint: The AI model failed after multiple retries. Click Retry to try again with all participants.
errors.validationHint: The file or input may not be supported by this model
errors.modelNotFoundHint: This model may be temporarily unavailable. Try selecting a different model.
errors.contentFilterHint: Try rephrasing your message to avoid content that may be filtered
errors.waitAndRegenerate: Wait a few moments and use the regenerate button below
errors.addOwnApiKey: Or add your own API key to avoid rate limits
errors.shortenMessage: ðŸ’¡ Try shortening your message or starting a new chat
errors.checkConnection: ðŸ’¡ Check your connection and use regenerate button below
errors.requestTookTooLong: ðŸ’¡ Request took too long - use regenerate button below to retry
errors.useRegenerateButton: ðŸ’¡ Use regenerate button below to retry this round
errors.rateLimitSolution: This model is experiencing high demand. Wait a moment and try again, or select a different model.
errors.modelUnavailableSolution: This model is temporarily unavailable. Retrying automatically or try selecting a different model.
errors.timeoutSolution: The request took too long. This might be a temporary issue. Try again or use a different model.
errors.networkSolution: Check your internet connection and try again.
errors.emptyResponseSolution: The model didn't generate any content. This is usually temporary. Try regenerating the response.
errors.modelErrorSolution: The model encountered an error processing your request. This may be due to content filters or input length limits.
errors.invalidRequestSolution: The request couldn't be processed. Check your input and try again.
errors.authenticationSolution: There's an issue with the API authentication. Please contact support.
errors.unknownSolution: An unexpected error occurred. Try again, and contact support if the issue persists.
errors.defaultDescription: The AI model encountered an error while processing your request.
errors.nonRetryableHint: This error cannot be automatically retried. Please try a different approach.

messageList.title: Unable to Display Messages
messageList.description: There was an error rendering the conversation messages. Your conversation is safe and can be recovered.
messageList.tryRefresh: Click the Retry button to attempt re-rendering messages
messageList.continueConversation: You can still continue the conversation with new messages
messageList.contactSupport: Contact support if this issue persists

privacy.tagline: Your privacy and data protection matter to us

changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
changes.title: 8. Changes to This Policy

children.content: Our service is not directed to individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
children.title: 7. Children's Privacy

collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, subscribe to a service, or contact us for support.
collection.title: 1. Information We Collect

contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at hello@roundtable.now.
contact.title: 9. Contact Us

cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our service and hold certain information to improve and analyze our service.
cookies.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking

rights.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You may also opt-out of certain communications from us.
rights.title: 6. Your Rights

security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
security.title: 4. Data Security

sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this Privacy Policy.
sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing

privacy.title: Privacy Policy

usage.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, and communicate with you.
usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information

terms.tagline: Guidelines for using our AI collaboration platform

acceptance.content: By accessing and using this service, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.
acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms

billing.content: You agree to pay all fees and charges incurred in connection with your use of the service. We reserve the right to change our fees at any time with prior notice.
billing.title: 3. Billing and Payments

contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at hello@roundtable.now.
contact.title: 8. Contact Information

governing.content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which the company is established, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
governing.title: 7. Governing Law

liability.content: In no event shall Roundtable, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages.
liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability

privacy.content: Your use of our service is also governed by our Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs the site and informs users of our data collection practices.
privacy.title: 4. Privacy Policy

services.content: This service is provided to help you manage your billing and subscriptions. You may use this service for lawful purposes only and in accordance with these Terms.
services.title: 2. Use of Service

termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and bar access to the service immediately, without prior notice or liability, under our sole discretion, for any reason whatsoever.
termination.title: 5. Termination

terms.title: Terms of Service
